content.body: I created https://github.com/tc39/proposal-amount/issues/75 after some chats with Oli.

I know eemeli is still waiting for "V8's list of grievances with string-based Amount", but I think as champions we can still discuss the feasibility of this direction. I added it to the agenda on Thursday
